Package calculator

Class DateTimeCalculator

java.lang.Object
calculator.DateTimeCalculator
public class DateTimeCalculator extends Object
Utility class for date and time calculations. Provides methods for calculating total hours worked, total overtime hours, regular hours worked, adjusted time in, total number of days, months, and years between two dates, and calculating overtime hours.

Available methods:

  • totalHoursWorked(List)
  • totalOvertimeHours(List)
  • regularHoursWorked(LocalTime, LocalTime)
  • adjustedTimeIn(LocalTime)
  • totalDays(List)
  • totalDays(LocalDate, LocalDate)
  • totalMonths(LocalDate, LocalDate)
  • totalYears(LocalDate, LocalDate)
  • overtimeHours(LocalTime, LocalTime)
